reviewText: A bit outdated but the content is still relavent. As a same sex couple in the process of adoption this made us aware of some of the issues we could encounter. It is honest and forthcoming so I still recommend it.
this video does an excellent job of addressing issues of modern families; did an excellent job of showing issues of gay parenting
This film is really honest- unashamed to show the fear, confusion, and excitement of a new family! Really great and tender, but still admits the intimidating truths of adoption.

Could easily have been preachy or heavy-handed, but instead, felt like watching the home movies of really nice people who care a lot about their families. Charming, but not sticky-sweet, either. Yeah, families!
